name: Mega Man AGAIN
description:
A classic adventure... 

With new content! Revisit the first of the many adventures of the blue bomber against the nefarious Dr. Wily in his full 8-bit glory, with features not available on the original, like:

-Charge Shot and Slide.
-New visuals.
-Many playable characters.
-Shop Items & Chips system.
-Widescreen.
-And more.

Controls: (Key binding is also available)

Arrows: Move Character/Menu Cursor
Z: Jump/Menu Accept
A: Shoot/Menu Cancel
X: Slide (You can also use Down+Jump!)
S: Item/Weapon Toggle
D: Cycle wpn Left
C: Cycle wpn Right

CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT
